about:
I am a passionate and highly motivated web developer with a strong technical background and expertise in programming languages and frameworks such as Java, JavaScript, PHP, ReactJS, HTML5, CSS3, and more. With over three years of professional experience in web application development, I thrive on creating user-friendly, responsive, and scalable web solutions that enhance performance and user engagement.

 I hold a Master of Applied Computing degree from the University of Windsor, where I gained expertise in advanced computing concepts, software engineering, and database systems. During my academic journey, I actively contributed to impactful projects like the Crypto Trading Web App and SpeechEase, developing full-stack applications that solved real-world challenges using modern technologies such as Django, Python, and Firebase.

 Professionally, I have worked with organizations like GAOTek Inc. and Polestar Solutions, where I led the development of responsive web applications, optimized server performance using AWS and PHP, and automated deployment pipelines with Docker and Jenkins. I am passionate about creating innovative solutions that drive business growth and continuously advancing my knowledge in the ever-evolving tech landscape.
